last_episode_to_air.name: Those Who Were Silent, Those Who Were Not
last_episode_to_air.overview: Yeong-min and Dong-gu have a final face-to-face. A heartbreaking letter from Sang-hun is difficult to swallow for Seo-hui, but doubly so for Yeong-mun.

name: The Lies Within
overview: Kim Seo-hui’s life is changed forever when her politician father dies in a car crash and her husband disappears – all in one day. She enters the world of politics and join hands with small-town detective Jo Tae-sik to uncover the truth when she finds out that the car crash might not have been an accident after all.

episodes.name: Hand
episodes.overview: Jo Tae-sik inspects an apparent suicide. After learning that Kim Seung-cheol died in a car accident, Kim Seo-hui can’t get a hold of Jeong Sang-hun.

episodes.name: Target
episodes.overview: Tae-sik and his team look into Sang-hun's disappearance -- and learn he and Seung-cheol were working on something together.

episodes.name: Bait
episodes.overview: When a factory worker he'd been trying to find turns up dead, Tae-sik investigates. Seo-hui forces herself through a tough campaign trail.

episodes.name: Restart
episodes.overview: Another grisly package surfaces. Tae-sik and his team suspect In Dong-gu is involved. Seo-hui tries to understand a bill that her party wants passed.

episodes.name: The Other Side
episodes.overview: Suspecting something is amiss at the mental hospital, the cops send Jeon Ho-gyu undercover. Seo-hui eavesdrops on Hong Min-guk and Dong-gu.

episodes.name: Disappear
episodes.overview: Tae-sik untangles the mystery of the mental hospital -- but Sang-hun remains missing. Seo-hui confronts Jeong Yeong-mun about what he knew.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: The search for answers continues as the police turn their attention to Jin Yeong-min, who turns out to have a long history with Sang-hun.

episodes.name: Eye
episodes.overview: Seo-hui comes clean to Tae-sik about the mysterious messages she's been hiding, and probes into a funeral Sang-hun attended before he vanished.

episodes.name: KEY
episodes.overview: While Tae-sik's reinvestigation into Choe Su-hyeon's death ruffles feathers left and right, Seo-hui asks around about her connection to Sang-hun.

episodes.name: Bottomless Pit
episodes.overview: Ignoring his suspension, Tae-sik chases leads from the list in the USB drive with Seo-hui. Kang Jin-gyeong brings Ho-gyu the dead laptop.

episodes.name: Framed
episodes.overview: Tae-sik recovers the list while on the run from authorities. Meanwhile, Jin-gyeong gets to the bottom of who framed him.

episodes.name: Disclosure
episodes.overview: Tae-sik and Jin-gyeong channel their grief into helping Seo-hui, who discovers a startling truth about what connects the people on the list.

episodes.name: Real Intention
episodes.overview: Getting their hands on damning evidence allows Tae-sik and Jin-gyeong to set a trap. Seo-hui receives another message.

episodes.name: Survivor
episodes.overview: Trying to turn votes against the bill, Seo-hui holds a press conference. Tae-sik tails Yeong-min, who has his own plans for the future of JQ Group.

episodes.name: Original Sin
episodes.overview: If Seo-hui wants to save Sang-hun, she must find one last crucial piece of evidence among her father's things. Yeong-min delivers an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Those Who Were Silent, Those Who Were Not
episodes.overview: Yeong-min and Dong-gu have a final face-to-face. A heartbreaking letter from Sang-hun is difficult to swallow for Seo-hui, but doubly so for Yeong-mun.
